author: Special Correspondent
text:
Aircel Chennai Open contributed over Rs. 10 lakh to the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Funds in view of the Chennai floods.

Tennis champion Leander Paes contributed Rs. 1,000 for every winner he scored and every ace he served in the tournament. Vijay Amritraj contributed Rs. 1 lakh while Aircel and Omnigel contributed. In addition, the Aircel Chennai Open also received the ATP ACES for Charity grant of $15,000.
title: Aircel contributes Rs. 10 lakh
